abstract: A new e-commerce tool lets any blogger open an online store.
snippet: A new e-commerce tool lets any blogger open an online store.
lead_paragraph: We already know that everyone from Ashton Kutcher to Don Draper, the slick ad man on “Mad Men,” could build a loyal following on Twitter, Facebook, blogs and other social sites.

headline.main: How to Turn Your Blog’s Readers Into Paying Customers
